value.title: This is why SC2 isn‚Äôt played on 50% hit points | PiG's Lab - StarCraft 2
value.excerpt: As part of PiG's Laboratory, I challenged StarCraft 2 pros to play with only 50% hit points - on everything! We get to witness how quickly everything dies. And best of all, Astrea and Cham have some clever solutions to this challenge! -- üê∑ Second Channel for Learning StarCraft 2: https://www.youtube.com/c/PiGRandom
